DOCGEN.USAGE: After enabling UDLD at global level or modifying global level UDLD attributes, use this command to check global level UDLD information
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli# show udld global
UDLD Global Information Admin State : UDLD Enabled Mode : Normal UDLD Message Time : 1 seconds UDLD Multiplier : 3

DOCGEN.USAGE: After enabling UDLD at global and interface level, use this command to get all UDLD neighbors information.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable sonic-cli# show udld neighbors
Port Device Name Device ID Port ID Neighbor State --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ethernet1 Sonic 3c2c.992d.8201 Ethernet0 Bidirectional Ethernet3 Sonic 3c2c.992d.8201 Ethernet3 Bidirectional

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows interface level UDLD information and neighbors details on this interface
DOCGEN.USAGE: After enabling UDLD at interface level, use this command to get interface level UDLD information and neighbors attached to this interface.

EXAMPLE.summary: Shows interface level UDLD information and neighbors details on this interface

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable sonic-cli# show udld interface Ethernet0
UDLD information for Ethernet0 UDLD Admin State: Enabled Mode: Normal Status: Bidirectional Local device id: 3c2c.992d.8201 Local port id : Ethernet0 Local device name: Sonic Message time: 1 Timeout interval: 3 Neighbor Entry 1 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Neighbor device id: 3c2c.992d.8235 Neighbor port id: Ethernet0 Neighbor device name: Sonic Neighbor message time: 1 Neighbor timeout interval: 3

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows UDLD statistics for all interfaces
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to get UDLD statistics for all interfaces

EXAMPLE.summary: Shows UDLD statistics for all interfaces

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli# show udld statistics
UDLD Interface statistics for Ethernet0 Frames transmitted: 10 Frames received: 9 Frames with error: 0
UDLD Interface statistics for Ethernet1 Frames transmitted: 5 Frames received: 8 Frames with error: 0

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows UDLD statistics for a specific interface
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to get UDLD statistics for a specific interface

EXAMPLE.summary: Shows UDLD statistics for a specific interface

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli# show udld statistics interface Ethernet0
UDLD Interface statistics for Ethernet0 Frames transmitted: 10 Frames received: 9 Frames with error: 0

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to enable UDLD globally
Use this command to disable UDLD globally. Disabling UDLD globally will also disable UDLD at interface level.

COMMAND.name: udld aggressive
COMMAND.help: Enable aggressive UDLD mode at global level

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change UDLD mode to aggressive. Default UDLD mode is normal.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld aggressive

COMMAND.name: no udld aggressive
COMMAND.help: Disable aggressive UDLD mode at global level

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Disable aggressive mode of UDLD. UDLD mode is restored back to default normal mode.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable aggessive mode of UDLD. UDLD mode is restored back to default normal mode.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld aggressive sonic-cli(config)# no udld aggressive

COMMAND.name: udld message-time
COMMAND.help: Configure UDLD message time value in seconds (1 - 30 sec)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure UDLD message time. It is the time interval at which periodic hellos are exchanged.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to set UDLD message time. Default message time is 1 second.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld message-time 3

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Reset UDLD message time to default 1 second.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to reset UDLD message time to default 1 second.

EXAMPLE.summary: Reset UDLD message time to default 1 second

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld message-time 3 sonic-cli(config)# no udld message-time

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure UDLD multiplier value. This multiplier value is used to determine the timeout interval (i.e. message-time x multiplier value) after which UDLD declares the link as Unidirectonal.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to set UDLD multiplier value. Default multiplier value is 3.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld multiplier 8

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Reset UDLD multiplier value to default 3.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to reset UDLD multiplier value to default value 3.

EXAMPLE.summary: Reset UDLD multiplier value to default 3

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# udld enable sonic-cli(config)# udld multiplier 8 sonic-cli(config)# no udld multiplier

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to enable UDLD at interface level
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable UDLD at interface level.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no udld enable

COMMAND.name: udld aggressive
COMMAND.help: Enable aggressive mode UDLD at interface level

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Enable aggressive mode of UDLD at interface level.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change UDLD mode to aggressive at interface level. Default UDLD mode is normal.

EXAMPLE.summary: Enable aggressive mode of UDLD at interface level

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld aggressive

COMMAND.name: no udld aggressive
COMMAND.help: Disable aggressive mode UDLD at interface level

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Disable aggressive mode of UDLD at interface level. UDLD mode is restored back to default normal mode.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to disable aggessive mode of UDLD at interface level. UDLD mode is restored back to default normal mode.

EXAMPLE.summary: Disable aggressive mode of UDLD at interface level

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld enable sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# udld aggressive sonic-cli(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no udld aggressive
